statements: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS customers (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, email TEXT, phone TEXT);
CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(100), phone_number VARCHAR(15)
CREATE TABLE campaigns (campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY, campaign_name VARCHAR(50), start_date DATE, end_date DATE, budget DECIMAL(10,2)
CREATE TABLE campaign_results (result_id INT PRIMARY KEY, campaign_id INT, customer_id INT, conversion_rate DECIMAL(5,2), sales_amount DECIMAL(10,2)
CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name VARCHAR, email VARCHAR);
CREATE TABLE campaigns (campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY, campaign_name VARCHAR, start_date DATE, end_date DATE, budget DECIMAL);
CREATE TABLE leads (lead_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT, campaign_id INT, lead_name VARCHAR, lead_email VARCHAR, status VARCHAR);
